comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: This picture was most likely taken between February 9 and 18, during the ten tragic days (Decena Trágica), When Felix Díaz and his supporters (felicistas) uprised against President Madero who eventualy was overthrown by Huerta and murdered on February 22, 1913. The artillery men are federals defending National Palace (and Madero). Click on archives.getty.edu/R/HI3CH8LEP7XCCUSLL49JT6CAEUJFE279UDT3... to see a panoramic version of this scene. Dr. Roberto Duarte Plastic Surgeon

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: In fotografosdelarevolucion.blogspot.mx/2009/11/miercoles-19... it says this picture was taken by noon of Wednesday, February 19, 1913. Dr. Roberto Duarte
